functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to sign up for events, I want to easily access the event registration, so I can participate without confusion.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app for event registration.
functional_jobs.pain_points: On the website, users have to navigate multiple pages and clicks to find event registration.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Streamlined access to event registration from the main calendar view.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can register for events in a few clicks without confusion.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I need to find information about committees, I want to easily locate committee descriptions, so I can get involved in activities.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Accessing the committee list on the website.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Committee descriptions are not clearly labeled or easily accessible on the website.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Clear and direct access to committee descriptions and contact information.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can find relevant committee information without difficulty.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am using the platform, I want to feel confident and informed, so I can engage with my community effectively.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app which is more intuitive than the website.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: The website is confusing, leading to feelings of frustration and inadequacy.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A user-friendly experience that empowers me to engage without hesitation.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling confident and satisfied with their ability to navigate and use the platform.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in events, I want to be seen as an engaged member of the community, so I can build my reputation and network.
social_jobs.current_solution: Attending events and using the app to sign up.
social_jobs.pain_points: Complicated website navigation may limit participation and visibility.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Easier access to participation opportunities to enhance my social presence.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Increased participation in events and recognition from peers.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I need to update my profile information, I want to do it quickly and easily, so I can keep my details current.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Accessing the member profile page on the website.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Finding how to update profile information is not straightforward.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick and intuitive access to profile management.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Users can update their profile information without confusion or delay.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I need to cancel an event registration, I want a straightforward process, so I can manage my commitments efficiently.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Contacting the committee via email to cancel.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: There is no direct option to cancel registrations on the app or website, requiring multiple steps.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: A clear, direct method to cancel event registrations.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Users can cancel registrations with one or two clicks.
